channel.title: Hosting server on Linux
channel.description:
I got a server source and client, everything but i want to host it on Linux. The problem is that the compiler and run thing are .bat files Now im asking here: how do i change the compiler.bat and run.bat so it still compiles and runs but than with compiler.sh and run.sh or something else that would work.
Christiaan.
